body: This Blackdahlia guy is wrong. On page 40, the guy was asking her to have a threesome(don't know with who, don't know if he mentioned someone). On page 41(bottom-right panel), the guy is saying "Two really big dicks .."(then I don't know how to read the next lines). So I'm guessing we're getting an mmf threesome next chapter.

Japanese h-manga artists are REALLY obsessed with penis size! That's all they're talking about in the last 2 pages.... HIM: "is my dick big?" HER: "Yes, it is!" HIM: "Is it bigger and better than your husband's?" HER: "Yes it is! I love your giant penis!"
